Recent Renovations At The Buckley's Entertainment Centre

Location: Breakwater, Australia
Date: 8/13/2024
Application: playground

Project Overview

Buckley's Entertainment Centre in Breakwater is a family-friendly club that has recently renovated its facilities, including Uncle Buck's Play Parlour. Designed for young children to explore, climb, and balance, it features a thick Rosehill TPV® softfall surface that cushions trips and falls.The vibrant surface showcases custom blends of Rosehill's pink, green, and blue rubber granules, complementing the bright play area while offering a long-lasting solution.Rosehill TPV® is designed as a practical surfacing solution that effectively absorbs impacts while retaining its softness for many years after installation, regardless of climate and UV exposure.Thanks to , and
